snippet: The police arrested a man suspected of hitting a New York City police officer on a four-wheel all-terrain vehicle and dragging him down a Brooklyn street.
abstract: Police arrest Kenny Ortiz, Queens man suspected of hitting a New York City police officer with four-wheel all-terrain vehicle and dragging him down a Brooklyn street, after five-day manhunt; Ortiz is charged with attempted murder of a police officer, assault, reckless driving and resisting arrest, among other crimes.
lead_paragraph: The police arrested a man suspected of hitting a New York City police officer on a four-wheel all-terrain vehicle and dragging him down a Brooklyn street.

headline.main: An A.T.V. Driver Is Accused of Running Down an Officer
headline.print_headline: An ATV Driver Is Accused of Running Down an Officer
